languages.text: {n}Чорда обводит бар разъяренным взглядом, в котором бушует пламя. Ее фигура словно источает беспощадное зарево, жестокое, как палящее солнце пустынного мира.{/n} "Мятежники и еретики! Я, Вольный Торговец Инцендия Чорда, владычица Футфола и защитница Правосудия, приказываю вам сложить оружие! Сдавшихся ждет строгий суд, прочих — позорная смерть!"

{n}Flame rages in Chorda's furious gaze as she surveys the bar. Her figure seems to exude a ruthless radiance, cruel, like the scorching sun of a desert world.{/n} "Rebels and heretics! I, Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda, Master of Footfall and Defender of Justice, am ordering you to lay down your arms! Harsh justice awaits those who surrender. An ignoble death awaits the rest!"
languages.original_text: {n}Чорда обводит бар разъяренным взглядом, в котором бушует пламя. languages.text: {n}库尔达怒视着这间就把，目光中的烈焰熊熊燃烧。她整个人似乎都散发着无情的光芒，就像沙漠世界的炎炎烈日一般。{/n}“你们这些乱党和异端分子！我是行商浪人因森蒂娅·库尔达，落脚港的主宰，正义的捍卫者！我命令你们放下武器！愿意投降的人，将会面临严酷的正义。至于剩下的人，则会判处痛苦的死刑！”
languages.original_text: {n}Flame rages in Chorda's furious gaze as she surveys the bar. Her figure seems to exude a ruthless radiance, cruel, like the scorching sun of a desert world.{/n} "Rebels and heretics! I, Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda, Master of Footfall and Defender of Justice, am ordering you to lay down your arms! Harsh justice awaits those who surrender. An ignoble death awaits the rest!"

traits.locale_text: {n}库尔达怒视着这间就把，目光中的烈焰熊熊燃烧。她整个人似乎都散发着无情的光芒，就像沙漠世界的炎炎烈日一般。{/n}“你们这些乱党和异端分子！我是行商浪人因森蒂娅·库尔达，落脚港的主宰，正义的捍卫者！我命令你们放下武器！愿意投降的人，将会面临严酷的正义。至于剩下的人，则会判处痛苦的死刑！”

languages.text: {n}酒場を見渡すチョーダの目には、炎が燃え盛った。その姿は冷酷な輝きを放ち、まるで砂漠惑星の灼熱の太陽のように残酷だった。{/n}「反逆者と異端者め！自由開拓者、インセンディア・チョーダ、フットフォールのマスターであり正義の擁護者は、武器を捨てる事を命じる！降伏する者には厳しい正義、その他には無様な死が待っているだろう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Flame rages in Chorda's furious gaze as she surveys the bar. Her figure seems to exude a ruthless radiance, cruel, like the scorching sun of a desert world.{/n} "Rebels and heretics! I, Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda, Master of Footfall and Defender of Justice, am ordering you to lay down your arms! Harsh justice awaits those who surrender. An ignoble death awaits the rest!"

traits.locale_text: {n}酒場を見渡すチョーダの目には、炎が燃え盛った。その姿は冷酷な輝きを放ち、まるで砂漠惑星の灼熱の太陽のように残酷だった。{/n}「反逆者と異端者め！自由開拓者、インセンディア・チョーダ、フットフォールのマスターであり正義の擁護者は、武器を捨てる事を命じる！降伏する者には厳しい正義、その他には無様な死が待っているだろう！」

languages.text: {n}La furiosa mirada de Chorda echa chispas mientras observa el bar. Su figura parece desprender un resplandor despiadado y cruel, como el sol abrasador de un mundo desértico.{/n} «¡Rebeldes y herejes! ¡Yo, Comerciante Independiente Incendia Chorda, maestra de Paso y defensora de la justicia, os ordeno que bajéis las armas! ¡Una dura justicia aguarda a aquellos que se rindan, mientras que una muerte indigna espera al resto!».
languages.original_text: {n}Flame rages in Chorda's furious gaze as she surveys the bar. Her figure seems to exude a ruthless radiance, cruel, like the scorching sun of a desert world.{/n} "Rebels and heretics! I, Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda, Master of Footfall and Defender of Justice, am ordering you to lay down your arms! Harsh justice awaits those who surrender. An ignoble death awaits the rest!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La furiosa mirada de Chorda echa chispas mientras observa el bar. Su figura parece desprender un resplandor despiadado y cruel, como el sol abrasador de un mundo desértico.{/n} «¡Rebeldes y herejes! ¡Yo, Comerciante Independiente Incendia Chorda, maestra de Paso y defensora de la justicia, os ordeno que bajéis las armas! ¡Una dura justicia aguarda a aquellos que se rindan, mientras que una muerte indigna espera al resto!».

languages.text: {n}Chorda sieht sich in der Bar um. Flammen wüten in ihrem zornigem Blick. Ihre ganze Gestalt scheint einen gnadenlosen Glanz auszustrahlen, grausam, wie die sengende Sonne einer Wüstenwelt.{/n} "Rebellen und Ketzer! Ich, Freihändlerin Incendia Chorda, Herrin von Footfall und Verteidigerin der Gerechtigkeit, befehle Euch, die Waffen niederzulegen! Jene, die sich ergeben, erwartet harte Gerechtigkeit. Die übrigen erwartet ein schmachvoller Tod!"
languages.original_text: {n}Flame rages in Chorda's furious gaze as she surveys the bar. Her figure seems to exude a ruthless radiance, cruel, like the scorching sun of a desert world.{/n} "Rebels and heretics! I, Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda, Master of Footfall and Defender of Justice, am ordering you to lay down your arms! Harsh justice awaits those who surrender. An ignoble death awaits the rest!"

Ihre ganze Gestalt scheint einen gnadenlosen Glanz auszustrahlen, grausam, wie die sengende Sonne einer Wüstenwelt.{/n} "Rebellen und Ketzer! Ich, Freihändlerin Incendia Chorda, Herrin von Footfall und Verteidigerin der Gerechtigkeit, befehle Euch, die Waffen niederzulegen! Jene, die sich ergeben, erwartet harte Gerechtigkeit. Die übrigen erwartet ein schmachvoller Tod!"

languages.text: {n}Les yeux furieux de Chorda lancent des éclairs lorsqu'elle balaie la salle du regard. Elle semble entourée d'une aura à la brillance cruelle et impitoyable, comme le soleil brûlant d'un monde désertique.{/n} « Rebelles et hérétiques ! Moi, Incendia Chorda, libre-marchande, maîtresse de Castel et championne de la justice, je vous ordonne de déposer les armes ! Ceux qui se rendront feront face à une justice implacable, mais seule la mort attend les autres ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Flame rages in Chorda's furious gaze as she surveys the bar. Her figure seems to exude a ruthless radiance, cruel, like the scorching sun of a desert world.{/n} "Rebels and heretics! I, Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda, Master of Footfall and Defender of Justice, am ordering you to lay down your arms! Harsh justice awaits those who surrender. An ignoble death awaits the rest!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux furieux de Chorda lancent des éclairs lorsqu'elle balaie la salle du regard. Elle semble entourée d'une aura à la brillance cruelle et impitoyable, comme le soleil brûlant d'un monde désertique.{/n} « Rebelles et hérétiques ! Moi, Incendia Chorda, libre-marchande, maîtresse de Castel et championne de la justice, je vous ordonne de déposer les armes ! Ceux qui se rendront feront face à une justice implacable, mais seule la mort attend les autres ! »

languages.text: {n}Bara göz gezdiren Chorda'nın öfkeli bakışları cayır cayır yanıyor. Çehresi, bir çöl dünyasının yakıcı güneşi gibi acımasız, zalim bir parlaklık yayıyor âdeta.{/n} "İsyancılar ve kâfirler! Ben, Hür Tacir İncendia Chorda, Binliman'ın Efendisi ve Adaletin Savunucusu, size silahlarınızı bırakmanızı emrediyorum! Teslim olanları ağır cezalar bekliyor. Geri kalanları bekleyen şey ise rezil bir ölüm!"
languages.original_text: {n}Flame rages in Chorda's furious gaze as she surveys the bar. Her figure seems to exude a ruthless radiance, cruel, like the scorching sun of a desert world.{/n} "Rebels and heretics! I, Rogue Trader Incendia Chorda, Master of Footfall and Defender of Justice, am ordering you to lay down your arms! Harsh justice awaits those who surrender. An ignoble death awaits the rest!"
